filmography.title: 20 Mule Team
filmography.role_description: A young woman caught in a conflict between borax miners in Death Valley; Baxter's film debut.
filmography.plot: A borax miner teams up with a tenderfoot to outsmart a claim jumper in the blistering heat of Death Valley.

filmography.title: Swamp Water
filmography.role_description: The wild, unkempt daughter of a fugitive hiding in the Okefenokee Swamp.
filmography.plot: A trapper discovers a fugitive hiding in the dangerous Okefenokee Swamp and falls in love with his daughter.

filmography.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
filmography.role_description: The sensible and loving daughter of an automobile inventor who falls for the spoiled heir of the Amberson fortune.
filmography.plot: The spoiled heir to a decaying family fortune tries to keep his mother from marrying the man she has always loved.

filmography.title: The Pied Piper
filmography.role_description: A courageous French woman who assists an Englishman in smuggling children out of Nazi-occupied France.
filmography.plot: An Englishman on vacation in France tries to get a group of children to safety in England as the Nazis invade.

filmography.title: Five Graves to Cairo
filmography.role_description: A French chambermaid in a North African hotel who tries to secure the release of her brother from the Nazis.
filmography.plot: A British soldier goes undercover at a hotel in the Sahara to spy on Field Marshal Rommel and discover the secret of his supply caches.

filmography.title: The North Star
filmography.role_description: A young Ukrainian villager whose life is shattered when the Nazis invade her peaceful farming community.
filmography.plot: Residents of a Ukrainian village organize a resistance movement against the invading Nazi forces.

filmography.title: The Sullivans
filmography.role_description: The wife of the eldest Sullivan brother, part of the tragic true story of five brothers killed in action.
filmography.plot: The true story of five brothers from Iowa who enlist in the Navy together during WWII and serve on the same ship.

filmography.title: Sunday Dinner for a Soldier
filmography.role_description: A resourceful young woman living on a houseboat who sacrifices to host a soldier for dinner.
filmography.plot: A poor family living on a houseboat in Florida scrapes together enough money to invite a soldier to Sunday dinner.

filmography.title: Guest in the House
filmography.role_description: A manipulative, neurotic woman who moves into her fiancé's home and systematically tears the family apart.
filmography.plot: A psychologically unstable young woman stays with her fiancé's family and begins to manipulate and destroy their relationships.

filmography.title: A Royal Scandal
filmography.role_description: A lady-in-waiting to Catherine the Great who vies for the attention of a handsome soldier.
filmography.plot: A comedy about the romantic escapades of Catherine the Great of Russia and her various lovers.

filmography.title: Smoky
filmography.role_description: A ranch owner who bonds with a wild stallion and the cowboy who trains him.
filmography.plot: A cowboy befriends a wild horse named Smoky, but they are separated when the horse is stolen.

filmography.title: The Razor's Edge
filmography.role_description: A tragic woman who loses her family and descends into alcoholism and degradation in Paris.
filmography.plot: A disillusioned WWI veteran travels the world seeking spiritual enlightenment while his friends drift apart.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Supporting Actress; Golden Globe: Win – Best Supporting Actress

filmography.title: Angel on My Shoulder
filmography.role_description: The fiancée of a judge whose body is possessed by a murdered gangster sent back from Hell.
filmography.plot: A murdered gangster makes a deal with the Devil to return to Earth as a respected judge to exact revenge.

filmography.title: Yellow Sky
filmography.role_description: A tough, tomboyish woman living in a ghost town who holds her own against a gang of bank robbers.
filmography.plot: A gang of outlaws hides out in a ghost town inhabited by an old prospector and his spirited granddaughter.
filmography.awards: WGA Award: Win – Best Written American Western

filmography.title: You're My Everything
filmography.role_description: A Boston socialite who becomes a silent film star but struggles with the transition to talkies.
filmography.plot: A musical comedy about a hoofing husband and his wife who becomes a movie star during the roaring twenties.

filmography.title: All About Eve
filmography.role_description: A seemingly innocent but ruthlessly ambitious young actress who insinuates herself into the life of a Broadway star.
filmography.plot: A timid but secretly ruthless ingénue insinuates herself into the life of an aging Broadway star, ultimately threatening her career and personal relationships.

filmography.title: A Ticket to Tomahawk
filmography.role_description: A sharp-shooting, knife-throwing deputy sheriff who guards a train shipment in the Old West.
filmography.plot: A traveling salesman gets mixed up with a narrow-gauge railroad's first run and a girl who is handy with a gun.

filmography.title: O. Henry's Full House
filmography.role_description: A sick woman who believes she will die when the last leaf falls from a vine outside her window.
filmography.plot: An anthology of five O. Henry stories, including 'The Last Leaf' where an artist saves a dying girl.

filmography.title: I Confess
filmography.role_description: A married woman whose past relationship with a priest complicates a murder investigation involving him.
filmography.plot: A priest comes under suspicion for murder, and cannot clear his name without breaking the seal of the confessional.
filmography.awards: Cannes Film Festival: Nomination – Grand Prize

filmography.title: The Blue Gardenia
filmography.role_description: A telephone operator who believes she may have committed a murder while drunk and tries to evade capture.
filmography.plot: A woman accused of murder tries to clear her name with the help of a columnist, unsure if she actually committed the crime.

filmography.title: The Spoilers
filmography.role_description: A saloon owner in Nome, Alaska who is caught between a mine owner and a corrupt gold commissioner.
filmography.plot: Gold miners in Alaska must protect their claim from a corrupt commissioner who is trying to steal it.

filmography.title: The Ten Commandments
filmography.role_description: The Egyptian throne princess who loves Moses but is destined to marry Pharaoh Rameses, sparking jealousy and conflict.
filmography.plot: Moses discovers his Hebrew heritage and leads his people out of Egypt, facing the wrath of Pharaoh Rameses.
filmography.awards: Laurel Award: Win – Top Female Dramatic Performance

filmography.title: Three Violent People
filmography.role_description: A former dance hall girl who marries a Confederate veteran and tries to hide her past from him.
filmography.plot: A Confederate officer returns home to Texas and marries a woman with a shady past, facing conflicts over his land.

filmography.title: Chase a Crooked Shadow
filmography.role_description: An heiress who is tormented by a man claiming to be her dead brother in a twisted game of deception.
filmography.plot: A wealthy heiress is confronted by a man who claims to be her brother, whom she knows is dead.

filmography.title: Summer of the Seventeenth Doll
filmography.role_description: A barmaid in Australia who refuses to accept that her annual summer romance with a cane cutter is changing with age.
filmography.plot: Two sugarcane cutters spend their layoff season with their mistresses, but this year tensions rise as traditions crumble.

filmography.title: Cimarron
filmography.role_description: A kind-hearted prostitute and old flame of the protagonist who reappears throughout his life in the Oklahoma territory.
filmography.plot: A newspaper editor settles in an Oklahoma boom town with his reluctant wife at the end of the nineteenth century.

filmography.title: Walk on the Wild Side
filmography.role_description: A Mexican cafe owner who helps a drifter searching for his lost love in 1930s New Orleans.
filmography.plot: A man travels to New Orleans to find his lost love, who is now working in a high-class brothel.

filmography.title: Fools' Parade
filmography.role_description: An aging prostitute on a houseboat who aids three ex-convicts trying to cash a check and escape a corrupt banker.
filmography.plot: Three ex-convicts released from prison try to cash a check for their prison earnings but are pursued by a corrupt banker and sheriff.
